description: Create a CSV export job with VQL query. Accepts CreateExportJobInput with service (required, enum: contact, company), vql (required, VQLQueryInput with selectColumns, optional where, orderBy, limit), s3Bucket (optional, String), retryCount (optional, Int). Uses build_export_vql_query to build VQL query, validates via validate_export_job_data, creates job via ConnectraClient with job_type 'export_csv_file'. Returns Job with uuid, jobType, status, data, createdAt. Export creates UserExport record (non-blocking). Raises ValidationError (422) if VQL query invalid.
graphql_operation: mutation CreateExportJob($input: CreateExportJobInput!) { jobs { createExportJob(input: $input) { uuid jobType status data createdAt } } }
